description: The Readmissions Complications and Deaths measures - state data. This data set includes state-level data for 30-day death and readmission measures, the hip/knee complication measure, and the Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality (AHRQ) measures of serious complications.

metadata.description: The Readmissions Complications and Deaths measures - state data. This data set includes state-level data for 30-day death and readmission measures, the hip/knee complication measure, and the Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality (AHRQ) measures of serious complications.

name: Readmissions Complications and Deaths - State
